page.title: 01AGHADOWEY -AN INTRODUCTION
page.content: { AGHADOWEY}is situated near the north coast of{Northern Ireland}in{County {Londonderry}in the area served by Coleraine Borough Council. The{main A29 road}from Coleraine passes through the area going on to Garvagh,Maghera and Cookstown. At one time the{railway}from Maghera to Coleraine was important for transport but it closed in 1950. The area has rich{farmland, important for raising{beef}and{dairy {cattle}but quantities of{potatoes}and {barley}are also grown.In the past,it was an important area for growing{flax and there were also many{bleach greens in the nineteenth and early twentieth century. This is a fairly prosperous area with a variety of{housing}ranging from mansion to modern bungalow.
